notes: Rakuten product pages are highly customised HTML stores. ItemUrl is permanent and cannot be changed after creation. GenreId must be a leaf genre from the Navigation API. HTML is allowed in itemCaption. ItemNumber is the seller's internal SKU.

fields.name: itemUrl
fields.description: Unique URL slug within the shop. Used as primary identifier in all item API calls. Permanent â€” cannot change after creation.

fields.name: itemNumber
fields.description: Seller's internal SKU or item number

fields.name: catchCopy
fields.description: Short promotional headline displayed in search results

fields.name: itemCaption
fields.description: Full product description. HTML markup is allowed and commonly used.

fields.name: genreId
fields.description: Rakuten genre (category) ID. Must be a leaf node from the Navigation API.

fields.name: imageUrl
fields.description: Primary product image URL (single value in basic API)

fields.name: horizontalName
fields.description: First variant axis label (e.g. 'Size'). Used if product has variants.

fields.name: verticalName
fields.description: Second variant axis label (e.g. 'Color'). Used if product has two variant dimensions.

fields.name: deliveryId
fields.description: Delivery method ID from Rakuten delivery settings
